languages.text: "Конечно, хотели. И хотят. И будут пытаться убить. Речь о не самом маленьком наследстве, в конце концов. И претенденты на это наследство — не самые мирные люди". {n}Капеллан пожимает плечами, будто говорит о чем-то совершенно обычном.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, хотели. И хотят. И будут пытаться убить. Речь о не самом маленьком наследстве, в конце концов. И претенденты на это наследство — не самые мирные люди". {n}Капеллан пожимает плечами, будто говорит о чем-то совершенно обычном.{/n}

languages.text: "Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Конечно, хотели. И хотят. И будут пытаться убить. Речь о не самом маленьком наследстве, в конце концов. И претенденты на это наследство — не самые мирные люди". {n}Капеллан пожимает плечами, будто говорит о чем-то совершенно обычном.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}

"Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}

languages.text: “当然，他们确实有理由，而且他们会继续这么做。毕竟这笔遗产不是个小数目，这些有权继承遗产的人也不是什么善茬。”{n}牧师耸了耸肩，仿佛在说一件不痛不痒的事情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “当然，他们确实有理由，而且他们会继续这么做。毕竟这笔遗产不是个小数目，这些有权继承遗产的人也不是什么善茬。”{n}牧师耸了耸肩，仿佛在说一件不痛不痒的事情。{/n}

languages.text: «Pues claro que sí. Y siguen queriendo hacerlo, y seguirán intentándolo. La herencia no es moco de pavo y los pretendientes no son precisamente defensores de la paz». {n}Capellán se encoge de hombros, como si hablara de algo evidente.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pues claro que sí. Y siguen queriendo hacerlo, y seguirán intentándolo. La herencia no es moco de pavo y los pretendientes no son precisamente defensores de la paz». {n}Capellán se encoge de hombros, como si hablara de algo evidente.{/n}

languages.text: 「それはそうでしょう。今もその隙を狙っているでしょうし、成功するまで何度も試みるでしょう。遺産相続は些末なことではありません。相続を主張する者たちも、決して穏やかなタイプではないですしね」{n}教戒官はよくある話をしているかのように、何気なく肩をすくめた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それはそうでしょう。今もその隙を狙っているでしょうし、成功するまで何度も試みるでしょう。遺産相続は些末なことではありません。相続を主張する者たちも、決して穏やかなタイプではないですしね」{n}教戒官はよくある話をしているかのように、何気なく肩をすくめた。{/n}

languages.text: "Aber natürlich. Und daran hat sich nichts geändert. Sie werden es weiterhin versuchen. Das Erbe ist schließlich keine Kleinigkeit. Und die Anwärter sind nicht unbedingt Gemütsmenschen." {n}Ordenspriester zuckt die Schultern, als spräche er über Alltagsangelegenheiten.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber natürlich. Und daran hat sich nichts geändert. Sie werden es weiterhin versuchen. Das Erbe ist schließlich keine Kleinigkeit. Und die Anwärter sind nicht unbedingt Gemütsmenschen." {n}Ordenspriester zuckt die Schultern, als spräche er über Alltagsangelegenheiten.{/n}

languages.text: « Évidemment, et ce quelqu'un continuera d'essayer jusqu'à ce qu'il parvienne à ses fins. Cet héritage est loin d'être une simple bagatelle et les prétendants ne sont pas des enfants de chœur. » {n}Chapelain hausse les épaules comme si c'était de notoriété publique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Évidemment, et ce quelqu'un continuera d'essayer jusqu'à ce qu'il parvienne à ses fins. Cet héritage est loin d'être une simple bagatelle et les prétendants ne sont pas des enfants de chœur. » {n}Chapelain hausse les épaules comme si c'était de notoriété publique.{/n}

languages.text: "İstemiştir tabii. Hâlâ da istiyordur. Denemeye de devam edecektir. Miras, hafife alınacak gibi değil sonuçta. Mirasta hak iddia edenler de uysal tipler sayılmazlar." {n}Papaz, olağan bir şeyden bahseder gibi omuzlarını silkiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Of course they did. And they still do. And they will keep trying. The inheritance is no trifle, after all. And the claimants are not exactly the placid types." {n}Chaplain shrugs, as if he's talking about something mundane.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İstediler tabii. Hâlâ istiyorlar. Denemeye de devam edecekler. Miras hafife alınacak gibi değil sonuçta. Hak sahipleri de pek uyanık." {n}Papaz, olağan bir şeyden bahseder gibi omuzlarını silkiyor.{/n}
